name.ja: <ruby>炎<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby><ruby>神<rt>しん</rt></ruby> ガルドニクス・エタニティ

text.en:
2+ Level 8 monsters
If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can destroy all other monsters on the field. You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy it, and if you do, this card gains 500 ATK. If this card with material is destroyed: You can Special Summon "Fire King" monsters from your GY, up to the number of materials this card had. You can only use each effect of "Fire King Deity Garunix Eternity" once per turn.

ja.set_name: Structure Deck R: Onslaught of the Fire Kings Second Coming of the Eternal Flames' Ruler Pack
